text: Amanda Barrie (born 14 September 1935) is an English actress. She appeared in two of the Carry On movies. She also starred as Alma Halliwell in ITV soap opera Coronation Street, which she played on and off for 20 years. She also played Bev Tull in the ITV prison drama series Bad Girls (2003â€“2006). Barrie is openly bisexual. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English LGBT people Category:LGBT actors Category:Bisexual people Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Amanda Barrie
